data.price: 85. And they ask you (O Muhammad صلى الله عليه و سلم) concerning the Rûh (the Spirit); Say: "The Rûh (the Spirit) is one of the things, the knowledge of which is only with my Lord. And of knowledge, you (mankind) have been given only a little."
data.arabic: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلرُّوحِۖ قُلِ ٱلرُّوحُ مِنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّي وَمَآ أُوتِيتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡعِلۡمِ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا

meta.transliteration: wayasalūnaka ʿani al-rūḥi quli al-rūḥu min amri rabbī wamā ūtītum mina al-ʿil'mi illā qalīlan

dua.name: Dua for Intellectual Humility
dua.significanceReason: Recognizes human limitations and seeks divine wisdom beyond human understanding.

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan
